Back to School with Verma Sacco

Access Funds Anywhere, Anytime

History

Founded in 2010, Verma Sacco has grown from a small community initiative in Rodi Kopany, Homa Bay County, to a trusted financial partner for small and medium enterprises (SMEs) and individuals. With a commitment to empowering dreams through accessible and tailored financial solutions, Verma Sacco continues to transform lives and fuel economic growth in our community.

Our Vision

To be the leading financial partner empowering communities to achieve financial freedom and sustainable growth.

Our Mission

To provide innovative, accessible, and affordable financial solutions that foster entrepreneurship, enhance livelihoods, and promote economic prosperity for our members.

Our Motto

"Empowering Dreams, Transforming Lives."

Core Values

  • Integrity: Honest and transparent in all we do.
  • Excellence: Delivering top-notch services.
  • Inclusivity: Supporting diverse member needs.
  • Accountability: Responsible and reliable.
  • Teamwork: Achieving together.
  • Empowerment: Enabling member growth.

Unlock A World Of Financial Services.

We provide a wide range of financial products and services geared towards uplifting our members' socio-economic status.

WHY JOIN US

  • We offer you an opportunity to accumulate savings through a variety of saving products.
  • Earn high returns on investment as members are able to enjoy lucrative annual dividends.
  • Education on proper management of finances and investment products.
  • Broad selection of products customized to meet your needs.
  • Access to affordable credit products with ease.
  • Easily accessible for consultation and advice.

WHAT WE OFFER

Savings Products

Saving is crucial for reaching your financial goals. At Verma Sacco, we offer a variety of savings products designed for both long-term and short-term needs, all with competitive returns. Explore our savings options to secure your financial future!

Fixed Deposit Account

Unlock the potential of your savings with a fixed deposit account at Verma Sacco! Enjoy guaranteed higher interest rates while keeping your funds secure. Choose your deposit term and watch your money grow, with returns paid upon maturity. It's a smart, low-risk way to boost your savings effortlessly.

Junior Savings Account

Kickstart your child's financial journey with a Junior Savings Account at Verma Sacco! Designed for young savers, this account offers a fun and engaging way to learn about money while earning competitive interest. With no monthly fees and easy access to funds, it's the perfect way to instill smart saving habits early. Watch their savings grow and inspire a lifetime of financial wisdom.

Member Deposits Account

Our Member Deposits Account is your key to financial growth and security. Enjoy competitive interest rates, flexible deposit options, and seamless access to your funds. Whether you’re saving for a dream or building a safety net, this account makes it easier to achieve your goals. Start your journey to financial success today!

Loans

Verma Sacco offers a variety of tailored loan products to meet our members' unique needs. Enjoy flexible repayment terms, affordable interest rates, and quick 24-hour processing.

Normal Loan

We offer competitive interest rates, flexible repayment terms, and quick processing to meet your financial needs. Whether for business or personal growth, Verma Sacco has you covered. Apply today and take the next step toward your goals.

Emergency Loan

When the unexpected happens, our Emergency Loans are here to help. With fast approvals, flexible terms, and affordable rates, Verma Sacco ensures you're covered when it matters most.

Development Loan

Our Development Loans are designed to fund your big dreams—be it a new project, business expansion, or personal growth. Enjoy flexible terms, low interest rates, and quick approvals. Turn your vision into reality with Verma Sacco.

Land Financing Loan

With Verma Sacco's Land Financing Loans, you can easily secure the land you've always wanted. Enjoy affordable interest rates, flexible repayment terms, and fast approval to make your dream property a reality.

Asset Backed Loan

Leverage your assets to access affordable financing with Verma Sacco's Asset-Backed Loans. Enjoy competitive rates, flexible terms, and quick approvals to meet your needs without letting your dreams wait.
